pages.title: Tap it!
pages.text: With the means to melt and cast, it's time to get some more serious protection against the $(thing)Mist$(). The first step of this is to find a $(item)Rubber Tree$() in the $(thing)Misty World's$() Tropical biomes and tap it with a $(item)Latex Pot$() to produce $(item)Latex$(), before processing it into $(item)Rubber$().

pages.heading: Rubber from Latex
pages.description: Stamp Sulfur (mined in Misty World) with liquid Latex and a Bar Stamp.

pages.title: Using a Latex Pot
pages.text: Place a Latex Pot on a Rubber Tree and wait for it to fill (pictured) to collect Latex.
